description.en: Watch the best TV shows, movies, music videos, variety selection of Korean dramas, and other premium content in high quality, translated into more than 150 languages by a community of avid fans.
description.nl: Bekijk de beste tv-programma's, films, muziekvideo's, verschillende Koreaanse drama's en andere premium inhoud in hoge kwaliteit, vertaald in meer dan 150 talen door een gemeenschap van fanatieke fans.
description.ga_IE: Watch the best TV shows, movies, music videos, variety selection of Korean dramas, and other premium content in high quality, translated into more than 150 languages by a community of avid fans.
